sentences.pinyin: qǐng nǐ bǎ yīnliàng jiàng dī yīdiǎn
sentences.translation: Could you please lower the volume a bit?

sentences.simplifiedText: 当经济下滑时，政府可能会降低利率以刺激经济。
sentences.traditionalText: 當經濟下滑時，政府可能會降低利率以刺激經濟。
sentences.pinyin: dāng jīngjì xiàhuá shí, zhèngfǔ kěnéng huì jiàngdī lìlǜ yǐ cìjī jīngjì
sentences.translation: When the economy slips, the government might lower the interest rates to stimulate the economy.

sentences.simplifiedText: 飞机在风暴中降落的时候，我感到很害怕。
sentences.traditionalText: 飛機在風暴中降落的時候，我感到很害怕。
sentences.pinyin: Fēijī zài fēngbào zhōng xiàluò de shíhou, wǒ gǎndào hěn hàipà.
sentences.translation: I was scared when the plane had to come down during the storm.
